metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt
• Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cr

subsection_analysis.refined_text: fajita seasoning and fajita seasoning are the main ingredients . chicken and vegetables are cooked through and vegetables are tender .
in a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper . season with salt and pepper to taste .

in a large bowl, mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, milk, beaten egg, ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper . shape the mixture into a loaf and place in a baking dish .
o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer for 20 minutes . o Add fish fillets, shrimp, and mussels, cook until seafood is done .
ground beef is cooked over medium heat in a skillet . add diced onion and minced garlic, sauté until softened . stir in taco seasoning and water, simmer until thickened .
